
                            
                            <p><img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/163929bat6a5tg5at5ppi5.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/01/163929bat6a5tg5at5ppi5.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1008.gif" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://www.zuanke8.com/static/image/smiley/cheng/em1008.gif"> 难受了，还有一些权益领取不到，只能记损了。	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">已经放弃了</p><p class="pl">能选短信验证吧，我上个月用短信验证的，发他要求的信息到一个号码验证登录</p>
